type: Tutorial Step - Shall We Dig Deeper?

definition.text: The logic behind the placing of buy orders is influenced by the Resistances & Supports Indicator Bot from the Masters Data Mine you ran earlier.

paragraphs.text: I took the liberty to turn the Supports layer on to show you this beauty... I hope you don't mind!
The indicator identifies levels (price ranges) on which price is rejected, and keeps a counter of how many rejections occur until the level is breached.

The way levels are represented on-screen varies with the number of rejections the level has witnessed, giving us a visual clue of how strong each support level may be. Once a level is breached, it disappears.
